version_description:
- iPad support
- Auto-correct and auto-capitalization
- CAPS LOCK
- Fixes landscape mode for iPhone
- Improved speed and results

Comments and feedback to hello@hemingboard.com

"Never pontificate. Always pun-tificate."
-Ernest's Hemingboard

Big performance and bug fixes in this version, as well as:
- iPad Pro support
- iPad split keyboard support
- UI polish for both iPhone and iPad
- Improved auto-capitalization

Other Improvements:
- Don't autocapitalize URL fields
- Faster keyboard loading
- Correct size for "zoomed" apps
- Better Hemingboard word replacement
- Fixed iPad share button

Tell us your bugs, new feature requests, and terrible puns at:
hello@hemingboard.com

- Added "." shortcut (double tap space)
- Screen for "No Results"
- Keyboards for Twitter/Instagram, URLs, and E-mail

*We're finalizing better bluetooth keyboard compatibility and will deliver it in the next version!*

Got a terrific suggestion or terrible pun?
Send them to hello@hemingboard.com.

"If Apple designed a literary Swiss Army knife, it would be Hemingboard."
- maxcboston

Thanks to your most stellar reviews,
We're happy to bring you Character Previews,
And did we mention, QuickType is here!
History will remember two: you and Shakespeare.

Other Updates:
- "Minimize Mode" for Bluetooth and Smart Keyboard users
- iPad Pro settings button fix
- Deleting an uppercase character now enables shift (thanks Jorg!)
- Autocorrect on word with punctuation in front of it now replaces it correctly

We'll continue to improve the QuickType/Predictive with forthcoming updates.

Send us your terrific ideas or terrible puns at hello@hemingboard.com

We're proud to deliver an outstanding update to the smartest keyboard for iPhone and iPad.
NEW: Force Touch to move cursor
NEW: Tap and hold a Hemingboard result for definitions
PERFORMANCE: 700% faster QuickType and Predictive (seriously!)
NEW: Rearrange Result Types (Rhymes before Puns, etc)
NEW: Learn your words by tapping on it in QuickType
NEW: Don’t autocorrect names of friends and contacts
ENHANCEMENT: Larger result text for iPads
NEW: Hold “Globe” button for settings
ENHANCEMENT: Disable QuickType for email and URL fields
ENHANCEMENT: Hide Hemingboard button on email and URL fields
ENHANCEMENT: Faster, more responsive typing
ENHANCEMENT: Dramatically better autocorrect on contractions (I’ll, She’s, Where’s, etc)
ENHANCEMENT: Hyphenated words search
ENHANCEMENT: Refreshed main app (check it out!) and onboarding
BUGFIX: No longer attempts to autocorrect on address fields
BUGFIX: Twitter/Instagram fields should have autocorrect
BUGFIX: Auto-capitalization in Facebook Messenger
BUGFIX: Tapping return should reset auto-capitalization
BUGFIX: Tapping return should reset QuickType suggestions
BUGFIX: Should auto-capitalize when moving cursor to a blank line
BUGFIX: Should auto-capitalize on starting a sentence with double quotes
BUGFIX: Should unshift after using QuickType as first word
BUGFIX: Eliminate duplicate results
OTHER: New, sleeker icon
OTHER: Less Jarring “back” button

Our new features, enhancements, and fixes are not possible without your feedback -- thank you.
Keep writing us at hello@hemingboard.com!

Adds rhymes, puns, and synonyms to your keyboard with Hemingboard.

- NEW: Dark keyboard mode
- ENHANCEMENT: Always show QuickType bar when QuickType is enabled
- ENHANCEMENT: Detect when text cursor is not on a word
- BUGFIX: Sometimes a word would fail to be detected on Pages for iPad

- Significantly Faster Typing
- Dark Keyboard - Settings Toggle
- Refreshed Interface for Definitions
- Autocorrect & autocapitalization Improvements

- ENHANCEMENT: Hold backspace longer to delete words
- ENHANCEMENT: Darker background on dark theme’s QuickType
- ENHANCEMENT: More responsive QuickType
- BUGFIX: QuickType wasn't resetting when text was cleared

- NEW FEATURE: Rhymes are separated out into “Top Rhymes” and “Rhymes” - easily see the best rhymes
- NEW FEATURE: Definitions in your language. If your device is Korean, Japanese, or Chinese, you’ll see definitions in your native language. More languages coming soon.
- ENHANCEMENT: Rhymes - Removed obscure words for easier browsing
- ENHANCEMENT: Rhymes - Dramatically better rhyme detection
- BUGFIX: Keyboard would sometimes switch back to stock keyboard

Other Changes
- BUGFIX: Show instructions for Smart Keyboard on iPad Pro 9.7”
- BUGFIX: iPhone 6+ keys were a bit different from the stock keyboard
- BUGFIX: Number and symbol keys background colors were wrong
- BUGFIX: QuickType - better word recognition

- NEW FEATURE: Rhymes are separated out into “Top Rhymes” and “Rhymes” - easily see the best rhymes
- NEW FEATURE: Definitions in your language. If your device is Korean, Japanese, or Chinese, you’ll see definitions in your native language. More languages coming soon.
- ENHANCEMENT: Rhymes - Removed obscure words for easier browsing
- ENHANCEMENT: Rhymes - Dramatically better rhyme detection
- BUGFIX: Keyboard would sometimes switch back to stock keyboard
- BUGFIX: QuickType would sometimes not work

Other Changes
- BUGFIX: Show instructions for Smart Keyboard on iPad Pro 9.7”
- BUGFIX: iPhone 6+ keys were a bit different from the stock keyboard
- BUGFIX: Number and symbol keys background colors were wrong
- BUGFIX: QuickType - better word recognition

- NEW: Antonyms - The same Hemingboard results you love, now with antonyms.
- NEW: Dark Theme Results - When Dark Theme is activated, results now have a dark theme.
- ENHANCEMENT: More Synonyms - Enhanced synonym results for thousands of words.
- ENHANCEMENT: Safe for Schools - Explicit and curse words are now filtered out from results.

hello@hemingboard.com

NEW FEATURE: Accents & Diacritical Marks. Tap and hold a letter to activate
ENHANCEMENT: Force Touch to move cursor now fades the keyboard out
ENHANCEMENT: More antonyms, remove duplicates
FIX: Fixed lowercase key sizes and positions
FIX: Fixed a bug where a key may not register after exiting force touch
FIX: Fixed a bug where double spacing after exclamation mark added a period

COMING SOON: Support for new languages

Feedback - hello@hemingboard.com

NEW FEATURE: Accents & Diacritical Marks. Tap and hold a letter to activate
ENHANCEMENT: Force Touch to move cursor now fades the keyboard out
ENHANCEMENT: More antonyms, remove duplicates
FIX: Fixed lowercase key sizes and positions
FIX: Fixed a bug where a key may not register after exiting force touch
FIX: Fixed a bug where double spacing after exclamation mark added a period

COMING SOON: Support for new languages

Feedback - hello@hemingboard.com

This app has been updated by Apple to use the latest Apple signing certificate.

Thanks for using Hemingboard! We update our app regularly for you to enjoy our features and improvements!

What’s New:

• Updated icons
• Minor UI Fixes
